data.message: EM..you probably think I'm dissing you cause I don't talk about you all that much. I got the sense from your records that's what you wanted. But you're the White Elephant in the room. The Satchel Paige of rap...playing all alone in the Negro Leagues for years. You're a hero, bro. A rap God, "the immortal comin through the portal," "placing bets on who's likely to become a serial killer." I'm trying to open up the Major Leagues and change the business. What do you say?
